nodes.text: Comptroller was a title that was sometimes held by the leader of a city or facility.

During the waning years of the Galactic Republic, the Human Nestin Thokor served as the comptroller of the city Oluna Biqua, on the planet Genarius. Later, during the time of the Galactic Civil War, the Human Garnak Fey served as the comptroller of the Silica Tab production lines on the planet Utapau.
